info.name: Users API V2_Smoke Test Cases - Integration Copy

item.name: GIVEB-168 API: Error codes: Foundational Error Code work

exec: //Function to assert Json value with the expected value
pm.test("Expecting status code to be 422", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The response should be a JSON", typeof(jsonData), 'object');
pm.test("The response body should contain 'errors' key", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'title' should be 'wrong_length_other:2' for input where province has more than 2 characters", jsonData.errors[0].title, "wrong_length_other:2");
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1026 for input where province has more than 2 characters", jsonData.errors[0].meta.validationCode, "1026");

request.description:
Seeded user id - 999010 (api@chimp.net)

Send a POST to /taxReceiptProfiles with four characters in Province field

Expecting status code to be 422

The response time shoule be less than 500ms

The response should be a JSON

The response body should contain 'errors' key

The value of key 'title' should be 'wrong_length_other:2' for input where province has more than 2 characters

The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1026 for input where province has more than 2 characters

exec: //Function to assert Json value with the expected value
pm.test("Expecting status code to be 422", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The response should be a JSON", typeof(jsonData), 'object');
pm.test("The response body should contain 'errors' key", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'title' should be 'inclusion' for input where province 'BC' does not match the country 'US'", jsonData.errors[0].title, "inclusion");
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1010 for input where province 'BC' does not match the country 'US'", jsonData.errors[0].meta.validationCode, "1010");

request.description:
Seeded user id - 999010 (api@chimp.net)

Send a POST to /taxReceiptProfiles where province does not belong to the Country keyed in

Expecting status code to be 422

The response time shoule be less than 500ms

The response should be a JSON

The response body should contain 'errors' key

The value of key 'title' should be 'inclusion' for input where province 'BC' does not match the country 'US'

The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1010 for input where province 'BC' does not match the country 'US'

exec: //Function to assert Json value with the expected value
pm.test("Expecting status code to be 422", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The response should be a JSON", typeof(jsonData), 'object');
pm.test("The response body should contain 'errors' key", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'title' should be 'blank' for input where 'fullName' is empty", jsonData.errors[0].title, "blank");
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1001 for input where 'fullName' is empty", jsonData.errors[0].meta.validationCode, "1001");

request.description:
Seeded user id - 999010 (api@chimp.net)

Send a POST to /taxReceiptProfiles with empty 'fullName'


Expecting status code to be 422

The response time shoule be less than 500ms

The response should be a JSON

The response body should contain 'errors' key

The value of key 'title' should be 'blank' for input where 'fullName' is empty

The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1001 for input where 'fullName' is empty

item.name: v2/taxReceiptProfiles - expecting error 'There was a problem in the JSON you submitted'

exec: //Function to assert Json value with the expected value
pm.test("Expecting status code to be 400", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The response should be a JSON", typeof(jsonData), 'object');
pm.test("The response body should contain 'errors' key", function () {

jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'title' should be 'There was a problem in the JSON you submitted' for input where value for key 'province' is missing", jsonData.errors[0].title, "There was a problem in the JSON you submitted");

request.description:
Seeded user id - 999010 (api@chimp.net)

Send a POST to /taxReceiptProfiles where value for key 'province' is missing in request body

Expecting status code to be 422

The response time shoule be less than 500ms

The response should be a JSON

The response body should contain 'errors' key

The value of key 'title' should be 'blank' for input where value for key 'province' is missing

The value of key 'ValidationCode' should be 1001 for input where value for key 'province' is missing

exec: //Function to assert Json value with the expected value
pm.test("Expecting status code to be 201", function () {
jsonValueCheck("The response should be a JSON", typeof(jsonData), 'object');
jsonValueCheck("The response should match the expected schema and should contain expected keys", tv4.validate(jsonData, schema), true);
jsonValueCheck("The value of key 'type' should be 'taxReceiptProfiles'", jsonData.data.type, "taxReceiptProfiles");

request.description:
Seeded user id - 999010 (api@chimp.net)

Send a POST to /taxReceiptProfiles with valid details

Expecting status code to be 201

The response time shoule be less than 500ms

The response should be a JSON

The response should match the expected schema and should contain expected keys

The value of key 'type' should be 'taxReceiptProfiles'
